settings.text: For inquiries, support, or to explore Pure Power's alternator solutions, feel free to contact us at 520.622.2778 or through this website. We will Ensure a prompt and informative response to address your specific automotive power needs.

settings.heading: Why Choose Pure Power High Output Alternators

settings.text: At Pure Power, we value our customers and strive to earn your business with every interaction. Our dedication to quality and customer satisfaction sets us apart in the industry.

settings.title: Michael A.
settings.text: Am a business owner here in town, so I know good customer service. They are very informative and have quality parts. I purchased an alternator for one of my cars and for some reason had to go through two alternators in which they warranted out for me with no hassle. There pricing is very fair. They also custom build alternators for special builds. Just buy your next alternator, starter...

settings.title: Kevin W.
settings.text: My 2018 Jeep Wrangler 3.6 just stranded me on the side of the road. The alternator failed. I was looking for a high output alternator anyway. Just didn't plan on it so soon. I found Copperstate on line. I purchased the 370 amp alternator and installed according to Copperstates instruction. I am getting 13.8 to 14.5 volts to the battery. I could not be happier. I promise to update this in one year. Thanks!

settings.title: Matthew B.
settings.text: I've never been happy with the quality of the auto part store alternators I have used in the past and I needed the part quicker than what I could find online. I went looking for a local place to pick up an alternator.I found Tucson Alternator, they were incredibly friendly and their customer service was top notch. The alternator is functioning exactly as expected and since they have been in business for...
